data.englishTranslation: Put your hand on the place where you feel pain and say: 'With the Name of Allah' (three times). (1) Then say: 'I seek refuge in Allah and in His Power from the evil of what I find and of what I guard against' (seven times). (2)
data.transliteration: Bismillaah. (1) 'A'oothu billaahi wa qudratihi min sharri maa 'ajidu wa 'uhaathiru. (2)
data.arabicVerse:
بِسْمِ اللهِ (ثَلاثاً)
أَعُوذُ بِاللهِ وَقُدْرَتِهِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا أَجِدُ وَأُحَاذِرُ.(سَبْعَ مَرَّاتٍ)
